{{Infobox Company | company_name = Verizon Florida LLC| company_logo = | company_type = [[Private company|Private]] (Subsidiary of [[Verizon]])| company_slogan = | foundation = [[1901]]| location = | key_people = | industry = [[Telecommunications]]| num_employees = | products = [[Telephone|Local Telephone Service]]| revenue = | parent = [[GTE]] (until 2000)
[[Verizon Communications|Verizon]] (2000-present)| homepage = [http://www22.verizon.com/about/community/fl/ Verizon Florida]| }} '''Verizon Florida LLC''' is a [[Verizon]] operating company providing telephone service in [[Florida]] to former [[GTE]] regions. It was founded in [[1901]] as the '''Peninsular Telephone Company'''. It was later acquired by [[GTE]] and became known as '''General Telephone Company of Florida''', and later shortened to '''GTE Florida, Incorporated'''.[http://sunbiz.org/pdf/90061859.pdf Florida Secretary of State, sunbiz.org, Verizon North, Inc., amended articles of incorporation] In 2000, GTE Florida was renamed "Verizon Florida", upon [[GTE]]'s buyout by [[Bell Atlantic]]. It serves the [[Tampa Bay Area]]. ==Sources== *[http://www.fcc.gov/wcb/armis/carrier_filing_history/COSA_History/gtfl.htm Verizon Florida, Inc.] == References == {{Verizon}} [[Category:Verizon Communications]] [[Category:Companies based in Florida]] [[Category:Companies established in 1901]] [[Category:Communications in Florida]] {{US-telecom-company-stub}}
